name: LD48: Down the Rabbit Hole
description:
Board the drilling vessel “Armadillo” to explore the extraordinarily dangerous “Rabbit Hole” cave system.

It’s so dangerous explorers call it “The Rabid Hole”.

Will you prevail where others perished?

Go deeper and deeper towards the unknown!

Made in 48 hours, for Ludum Dare 48 ("Deeper and deeper").

Instructions

  • Move with arrow keys or WASD.
  • To attack, keep X or P pressed.
  • To dig, keep Z or O pressed.

See the in-game instructions for details, I’ll not repeat everything here! ;-P
